00332 typedef blitz::TinyVector<long int,2> Shape;
00333 
00341 inline bool
00342 operator==( const Shape & sh1, const Shape & sh2){
00343   return ( sh1(0)==sh2(0)  &&  sh1(1)==sh2(1) );
00344 }
00345 
00353 inline bool
00354 operator!=( const Shape & sh1, const Shape & sh2){
00355   return ( sh1(0)!=sh2(0)  ||  sh1(1)!=sh2(1) );
00356 }

00438 inline std::string toString (long double   n)   { return toString("%g", n); }
00440 inline std::string toString (double        n)   { return toString("%g", n); }
00441 inline std::string toString (float         n)   { return toString("%g", n); }
00442 inline std::string toString (long int      n)   { return toString("%i", n); }
00443 inline std::string toString (int           n)   { return toString("%i", n); }
00444 inline std::string toString (long unsigned n)   { return toString("%u", n); }
00445 inline std::string toString (unsigned      n)   { return toString("%u", n); }
00446 inline std::string toString (const Shape & shp) { return toString("%u, %u", shp(1), shp(0));}

00481 
00488 template<int N> blitz::Array<float,N> &
00489 unzero(blitz::Array<float,N> & arr){
00490   if ( (blitz::min)(arr) <= 0.0 ) {
00491     warn("unzero", "Minimum in the array is sub-zero."
00492          " This should never happen with the absorption data.");
00493     float mina = (blitz::max)(arr)/100.0;
00494     if ( mina <= 0.0 )
00495       throw_error ("unzero", "Bad absorption data (maximum is sub-zero).");
00496     float *data = arr.data();
00497     for (int icur = 0 ; icur < arr.size() ; icur++ ) {
00498       if ( *data <= mina ) *data = mina;
00499       data++;
00500     }
00501   }
00502   return arr;
00503 }
00504 
00511 template<int N> inline blitz::Array<float,N>
00512 unzero(const blitz::Array<float,N> & arr){
00513   blitz::Array<float,N> out(arr);
00514   return unzero(out);
00515 }
